sentences.sContent: Sally keeps her make-up kit in her bag.

sentences.sContent: ...Schools or teachers who sign up for the National Math Club receive a kit fall of activities and resources...
...They also found that the group using the hands-free kit made 83% more errors in their tasks than those who were not talking...
